data.title: Abbie Cornish Denies Affair with Ryan Phillippe
data.meta_description: Actress Abbie Cornish has denied having an affair with Ryan Phillippe.It was reported that the 24-year-old Australian beauty had been romancingthe actor – who split from Reese last month – after meeting him on the Texasset of their independent film 'Stop Loss'.Abbie has now vehemently denied the allegations, insisting the pair werenothing more than “good friends”.She told America’s Star magazine:
data.text:
Actress Abbie Cornish has denied having an affair with Ryan Phillippe.

It was reported that the 24-year-old Australian beauty had been romancing

the actor – who split from Reese last month – after meeting him on the Texas

set of their independent film 'Stop Loss'.

Abbie has now vehemently denied the allegations, insisting the pair were

nothing more than “good friends”.

She told America’s Star magazine: "We were very good friends and we did

spend a lot of time together, yeah. But we're friends and that's it.”

It was alleged that Abbie and Ryan were quite blatant about their

relationship in front of the cast and crew, despite the fact that the

32-year-old actor was married.

A source previously said: "Ryan did not go out of his way to hide the fact

that he was having a fling with Abbie. Besides the fact they were spotted

making out in a sushi restaurant together, she was spotted many times

leaving his loft apartment."

Reese, 30, was said to have found out about her husband’s alleged infidelity

after reading a racy message on his BlackBerry handheld computer-and-phone.

The ‘Walk The Line’ actress recently filed for divorce from Ryan citing

“irreconcilable differences” and asking for joint custody of the couple's

children - seven-year-old Ava and three-year-old Deacon.
